item.title: Newbie Question :p
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

they arent the same. the condition is but the outcome is different. one sets to false and the other to true.

 if (Hunger == true) {
                        Hunger = false;
                        System.out.println("I am full.");
                } else if (Hunger = false) {
                        Hunger = true;
                        System.out.println("I am hungry.");
                }

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie Question :p
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Wouldn’t this

if (Hunger == false) { Hunger = true; System.out.println("I am hungry."); } else if (Hunger = true) { System.out.println("I am full."); }

Be the same as this

if (Hunger == true) { Hunger = false; System.out.println("I am full."); } else if (Hunger = false) { System.out.println("I am hungry."); }

Thanks and if someone could improve it that would be great if there is anything.

Read full topic
